name: Finder Zen
short_description:
Finder Zen is a Swift game that uses Apple native APIs like Sprite Kit and AVFoundation to create relaxing or intense game experiences. It demonstrates what Swift and Sprite Kit can do. 
-------------------------Instructions--------------------------
 - Blue balls adds 1 point if it reaches Finder. 
 - Red balls make you lose if it reaches Finder. 
 - Green balls destroy all evil items and adds 10 points if clicked. 
 - Yellow balls make you lose if clicked. 
 - Blue and Red balls can be destroyed by clicking. 
 - Green and Yellow balls will fade out over time.
summary: A simple casual Sprite Kit game written in Swift.
